long_description: The streamlined Kelty Tour 1.0 child carrier is lean on bells and whistles, but comes fully loaded with an adjustable suspension and robust child safety and comfort. Adjustable, 5-point child harness; convenient child leg-secure system helps ensure easy access in and out of the child harness. Lightweight aluminum frame supports a suspension that adjusts to fit 15 - 18 in. torso lengths. Harness features a curved hipbelt and padded shoulder straps with sternum strap for long hours of carrying comfort. Patented Auto-Deploy(TM) kickstand with no-pinch hinges provides a stable platform for loading and unloading your child. The Kelty Tour 1.0 child carrier features a generous storage pocket for food, bottles and diapers.
short_description: The streamlined Kelty Tour 1.0 child carrier is lean on bells and whistles, but comes fully loaded with an adjustable suspension and robust child safety and comfort.
